name: Stack Tower Jump 1.2
description:
Jump higher with the ball on the stacking platforms. Arrow keys to move.

Avoid to hit red colored hazards as in liquid, balls and spikes! Can you survive till the end?!

-------------

Hyper casual arcade game just made in few days! 

My second Ludum Dare -Creation. Jump with ball and reach higher! (Current Version 1.2.)

** This game is entered as unfinished to "Compo". This new version is being submitted to "Normal Jam challenge".

Made with Construct 3.

--------------

If you get interested of my creations, send me message!
